title: 07/14/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 07/14/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin provides an update on the faceoff between Aaron Rodgers and the Packers and why we shouldn't be surprised if the superstar quarterback is traded midseason. He discusses Kawhi Leonard's future with the Clippers and why this relationship could end much quicker than we expect. He also shares his 2021 predictions for the AFC and surprising team with Super Bowl hopes is left out of the playoffs. Plus, NBA All-Star Michael Redd joins the show to tell Colin what Chris Paul is like as a teammate and previewing game 4 of the NBA Finals.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
